column1:
Patch22,"2014-03-16T14:42:27.95Z","Crocodile Legend Beast Review.","

The Crocodile Legend Beast is a great set with 121 pieces,which is pretty good Value set and also the cheapest set that the Cragger Minifigure is included in.
The box is quite small, but still a good size for a Smaller set, The box shows Cragger riding the Crocodile Legend Beast.
The pieces in this set are great!, you get some of the new joint pieces,New teeth and Claws, which will be very useful for building creatures.
This set also comes with Some printed pieces, the Crocodile'
column2: s eyes and tongue are all printed, but all the armour&nbsp
column3: on the Crocodile Legend Beast are&nbsp

column2: included is Cragger, he is very detailed, he had a Sword, a shield and some Golden armour.

column1: This is the cheapest set that Cragger
column2: is included in, so far, Although Cragger&nbsp
column3: does come in some other sets, he is a Very detailed Minifigure&nbsp
column4: and is a great Minifigure to have.

column1: The build is very fun for a small set and it took Me about ten minutes to finish.
The complete Models looks Great, the Crocodile Legend Beast has a Lot of The new joint pieces, which gives it a lot of movement.
The Crocodile Beast mouth can open, his tail can move up and his legs can move Too.
Overall this is a very good set, worth buying and I defiantly
column2: recommed it.

column1:
,TRUE,5,5,4,4,5 Odeinoichus","2016-05-19T02:18:35.74Z","The Legends Return","

Set #70126 Crocodile Legend Beast: LEGO introduced some brand new style of pieces with the 2014 Legends of Chima sets, those were the smaller ball and socket joints that have allowed for some awesome new MOC opportunities. They also feature prominently in the new Mixels line. Only five of the legend beasts as seen on the show were created so far, there may still be hope of seeing the others. Though I&rsquo
column2: m not sure about that with the Fire vs. Ice theme being the dominant play feature of the line.

column1: This set is a fun small build that you can enjoy. This review will be slightly shorter than you might expect, however I felt it important to go into all the details without using the pro/con style as this little set deserves indepth discussion rather than point form comments. Read on and find out my thoughts on this set.
Box: The boxes designed for the Legend Beasts are new smaller sized boxes, a first for the Chima Theme as most sets before this were in larger boxes. The design draws your eye on the shelf, it&rsquo
column2: s a fun little box with some impressive pictures for the set. The Legend Beast title draws your attention to the box.
ll find cross-promotional images of the remaining four beasts and explains that there&rsquo
column3: s an online game you can access from the App Store. (A code is included to unlock the beast in-game on your App on a thick stock card. Which is designed to be scanned by your smartphone.)

column1: Instructions: Simple instruction manual for this set
column2: it&rsquo
column3: s easy to follow and has cross-promotional images of the rest of the early 2014 line. It does not include the checklist of minifigures you&rsquo
column4: ll find in larger sets, however here I can forgive this as there are only so many pages. The manual comes folded in the box and it is a small box so creases and damage are a risk you may run into depending on how it was packaged. The included sticker sheet for the details may or may not suffer a similar fate, you won&rsquo
column5: t know until you open the box to find out.

column1: This set includes a lot of useful parts for MOCing, especially if you want a decent number of the ball and socket mini-joints. Each Crocodile LB includes five of the new joints. Also some of the claw pieces in dark green and tan are there&hellip
column2: Or are they teeth? Well their used for claws here.

column1: Cragger is the only Mini-Figure included in this set and he&rsquo
column2: s pretty impressive actually. You&rsquo
column3: ll only find this particular version in this set, he has his double-sided torso, printed legs, double-sided facial print, unique print head piece and special golden Chi armor. He also has a transparent blue shield and a gold blade weapon with blue Lightsaber bar inside as accessories.

column1: Cragger is a great looking mini-figure and you can&rsquo
column2: t go wrong nabbing this set for him.

column1: As I mentioned above this build is pretty quick, it shouldn&rsquo
column2: t take longer than 25 minutes max to finish the build. Probably less, the steps aren&rsquo
column3: t too difficult and many of them are mirrored for the claws/feet and other areas like the mouth.

column1: Using stickers for the numerous scale details instead of printed pieces is a bit of a disappointment though. The special printed croc eyes are nice though. I enjoy the build for the mouth a lot too, it&rsquo
column2: s very intuitive and clever, and the hinged jaw is an excellent play feature.

column1: This is a solidly designed brick-built animal. The new ball joints make for a nice treat, because it allows the crocodile to maneuver his limbs into different poses. With the hinge joint in the torso you can get a wide variety of mobility and display options for the model limited only by your imagination.
I love the design of all these legend beasts, they have a few minor issues, considering he&rsquo
column2: s a belly dragger you do have some leeway in how you view the model. I do think it might have helped to include extra joints in the feet to make slightly longer legs, however that&rsquo
column3: s where MOCing comes in. Still he looks pretty impressive and you&rsquo
column4: re going to have some fun making awesome swimming poses for him. Also endless hours of fun opening and closing the jaw to bite down on enemies.

column1: I strongly recommend the legend beasts, this one is a really fun little build and you&rsquo
column2: re going to want him for the unique version of Cragger if you&rsquo
column3: re collecting all the different versions of him. This also is a great parts pack and fairly cheap, so you can start building up a large collection of the new ball and socket joints as well as some decent dark green and medium green coloured pieces.
